action.action-desc: Mr. Pfluger (for himself and Mr. Soto) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To require the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to submit to Congress a plan for the Assistant Secretary to track the acceptance, processing, and disposal of certain Form 299s, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Broadband Deployment Tracking Act.

section.header: Plan for assistant secretary to track the acceptance, processing, and disposal of certain form 299s

subsection.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Assistant Secretary shall submit to the appropriate congressional committees a plan containing a description of—

paragraph.text: the process by which the Assistant Secretary proposes to—

subparagraph.text: track the acceptance, processing, and disposal of each Form 299 for communications use authorization;
provide applicants additional transparency with respect to the status of the applicable Form 299 for communications use authorization; and
most expeditiously implement the plan; and

paragraph.text: any potential barriers to implementing the plan that are identified by the Assistant Secretary.
The term appropriate congressional committees means—

subparagraph.text: the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives; and
the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation of the Senate.

paragraph.text: The term Assistant Secretary means the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information.

The term communications facility has the meaning given the term communications facility installation in section 6409(d) of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 (47 U.S.C. 1455(d)).
The term communications use means the placement and operation of a communications facility.
The term communications use authorization means an easement, right-of-way, lease, license, or other authorization—

subparagraph.text: provided by the Secretary of the Interior or the Secretary of Agriculture;
to locate or modify a communications facility on covered land; and
for the primary purpose of authorizing the occupancy and use of such covered land for communications use.

paragraph.text: The term Form 299 means the form established under section 6409(b)(2)(A) of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 (47 U.S.C. 1455(b)(2)(A)), or any successor form.
The term National Forest System has the meaning given the term in section 11(a) of the Forest and Rangeland Renewable Resources Planning Act of 1974 (16 U.S.C. 1609(a)).
The term public lands means land under the management of—

subparagraph.text: the United States Fish and Wildlife Service; or
